settings.resync.explained: Loads all wantet items into storage and filters on unique items. This may take quiet some time

settings.favorite.explained: Highlighted Labels are used to emphasis good and less good record labels, in categories from poor to very good, as seen below. Fill in the lists of your {{label}} labels - separated by line break
